EmailTemplate.name: Please update your email address in Salesforce.com
EmailTemplate.subject: Please update your email address in Salesforce.com
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Salesforce.com user,
Your account has been identified as one having an invalid email address. In order for us to send you communications and updates, we need to have the right email address.
To change the email address you have on file with salesforce.com (for password reminders, corporate communications, etc.), please follow the steps below:
1. Click on:
Setup | Personal Setup | Personal Information | Edit.
2. Update the Email field with your current email address.
3. Click "Save".
Once this change has been made, you should receive two emails. One email will go to the old email address on the user record and the other will be sent out to the new email address.
You will need to log into the NEW email address and accept this change by clicking the link in the confirmation email. After verifying the new email address, will you see the new email address on the user record in question.
Thanks,Ryder Sales Admin
